rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Room
rooms.description: The entrance hall is positioned towards the north as per Vastu norms for a north-facing entrance. It opens into a spacious living room that provides an inviting atmosphere with natural light.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office, placed in a quiet corner to ensure productivity. It has ample window space facing east or north for optimal light and inspiration.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom is designed with a focus on comfort and tranquility. It incorporates Vastu principles by placing the bed in the southwest corner, away from the direct north.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A private gym area designed for personal workouts, ensuring a dedicated space for fitness. It follows Vastu guidelines by being placed in the southeast direction to maintain energy balance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: The kitchen is designed for ease of movement and energy flow, ensuring that the cooking area faces east or south for optimal Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: The bathroom is designed to be compact yet functional, placed appropriately according to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dedicated dining space that encourages family interaction, positioned to benefit from natural light.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door designed to welcome positive energy as per Vastu principles.
